name: Adna (QGuilbaut)
description:
Adna is an contemplative/ adventure game in a snowy environment in wich you control an old spirit in quest of her lost story. 

In  this game you will need to resolve some enigma in order to explore all the world and find all the memory fragment hidden in it.

This Game is our second year final project at Creajeux.

Trailler : https://youtu.be/2JyjGSuB-A0

Programmers :

Sylvain FRAPPEZ (Lead Projet)

Erwan GEROT (Lead Prog)

Quentin GUILBAUT (Prog Shader)

Jean-Baptiste COMTE(Prog Controller)

Cédric JARNO(Prog Son)

Alexandre HUCHET (Prog Gameplay)

Artists :

Gwendoline BIADALLA (Lead Graph)

Valentin RAMEZ (Texture/Illu) 

Clémentine BOSON(Assets/Animation)

(Temporaire) Manon PELLEGRIN(Assets) 

(Temporaire)  Dorian  ROUGET(Assets)
